text:

says 
"
When migrating from one minor release to another minor release within the same major release (e.g. from Tomcat 8.0.27 to Tomcat 7.0.28) you can retain 
...
"

should say 
(e.g. from Tomcat 7.0.27 to Tomcat 7.0.28)
